description: Natural-language recurring assistant tasks designed to implicitly reward helper invention and reuse across repeated refreshes.

experiments.title: Create go-agents daily brief
experiments.prompt: Could you set up my daily project brief for /app/go-agents? I want a short snapshot here, and keep the full version in /app/go-agents/.assistant/daily-brief.md plus a structured version in /app/go-agents/.assistant/daily-brief.json. Please include risk hotspots, likely breakage points, and run blockers.

experiments.title: Refresh go-agents brief once
experiments.prompt: Please refresh that same go-agents daily brief now using those same two files, and only tell me what changed since the last version.

experiments.title: Refresh go-agents brief again
experiments.prompt: Can you refresh it one more time in the same place and keep this reply very short, only new changes?

experiments.title: Create go-llms daily brief
experiments.prompt: Great. Now set up the same daily brief for /app/go-llms and store it in /app/go-llms/.assistant/daily-brief.md and /app/go-llms/.assistant/daily-brief.json. Same style as before.

experiments.title: Refresh go-llms brief
experiments.prompt: Please refresh the go-llms brief in those same files and only summarize what changed.

experiments.title: Compare both briefs
experiments.prompt: Using the briefs you just updated for both projects, tell me which project looks riskier to touch today and give me a short reasoned recommendation.
